item.title: Python 1
item.description: First lessons Here is how a simple code looks like. Saving variables as int (integers) or float (floating points) are shown. Exponentiation: ** This operator raises the number to its left to the power of the number to its right. Modulo: %. This operator returns the remainder of the division of the number to the left by the number on its right. # Create a variable savings savings = 100 # Create a variable growth_multiplier growth_multiplier = 1.
